about_the_game:
After an accident, a dissatisfied CEO is reincarnated in another world. Summoned by a fairy of a dying company, she is asked to use her skills to save the company. Will her skills translate in this strange fantasy world? And more importantly, can she sate her lezdom desires?​

The player will take the role of a CEO transported to a fantasy world. You will increase the value of the company by leveling up various stats and do "business deals" to take over other businesses. Subjugate other businesses and get them to see that working for you is for the best. The game features turn-based "business deals" with various strategies you can employ based on how you spec your company.

It's not just businesses you have to take on. You'll be facing the city guards, the church, the criminals, and more as you strive to take over the city.

As a dominant lesbian, the player will train many employees and former rivals to submit and be loyal servants. This is achieved through discipline and love. The game features a BDSM training system to train your servants. Training them isn't just for plot, but they can also be equipped and used in "business deals" and help you through boosting your stats.

The game is a mix of a trainer, visual novel, and RPG. Player can expect relationship-building mechanics with adult scenes and RPG-style turn-based combat as they progress the plot. Gameplay is single-player, RPG, Simulator. Players can expect interactive adult scenes, turn-based combat, buying items to help progression, VN-style story progression.

content_descriptors.notes: The game features explicit, uncensored sexual content and nudity featuring lesbian BDSM elements.

name: Lezdom CEO Fantasy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows® 8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL / VRAM 1GB or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
